definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: poet., hoof-beat Ju Jdg 5:28; late, of human footfall, footstep, fig. Ps 17:5 (‖[[אֲשׁוּרַי]]), Ps 119:113; [[וְיׇשֵׂם לְדֶרֶח פְּעָמָיו]] Ps 85:13.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: foot, of ark Ex 25:12, Ex 37:3 (P).—[[פַּעֲמׂתָיו]] 1Ki 7:30 read [[פִּנּוֹתָיו]] (cf. v:1Ki 7:34).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[אֶחָָת]] ´[[מ]] [[[אַחַת]]] one time, once Jos 6:3, Jos 6:11, Jos 6:14 (JE), Jos 10:42 (D) + 3 t. +2Sa 23:8 Qr (>Kt [[אחד]]); [[פַּעֲמָָיִם]] twice Ge 41:32 + 6 t.; ´[[פ]] Na 1:9 second time; ´[[אַרְבַּע פ]] Ne 6:4 four times; ´[[חָמֵשׁ אוֹ שֵׁשׁ פ]] 2Ki 13:19, cf. ´[[מ]] [[חֲמִישִׁית]] Ne 6:5; also c. [[שָׁלשׁ]], [[שֶׁבַע]], q.v.; ´[[עֶשֶׂר פ]] ([[וֶה]]) Nu 14:22 (JE) Ne 4:6, Job 19:3, all indef. = over and over; indef. also [[פַּעַם וּשְׁתָָּיִם]] Ne 13:20 once and [i.e. or] twice; [[פַּעֲמַיִם שָׁלוֹשׁ]] Job 33:29 twice (or) thrice; [[מֵאָה פְעָמִים]] 2Sa 24:3 = 1Ch 21:3, ´[[אֶלֶף פ]] De 1:11; [[רַבּוֹת]] ´[[פ]] Ps 106:43, Ec 7:22; [[עַד־כַּמֶּה פְעָמִים]] 1Ki 22:16 = 2Ch 18:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[כְּפַעַם־בְּפַעַם]] as time on time, i.e. as formerly, as usual, Nu 24:1 (E) Ju Jdg 16:20, Jdg 20:30, Jdg 20:31, 1Sa 3:10 (cf. Dr) 1Sa 20:25.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[בַּפַּעַם]] ([[גַּם]])[[הַוּאׁת ]] at this repetition (this time) also Ex 8:28, Ex 9:14 (J) + 3 t.; [[הַהִוא]] ´[[גַּם בַּפּ]] De 9:19, De 10:10.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[הַפַּעַם]] (Hex only J): (1) = this once Ge 18:32, ´[[אַח הַפּ]] Ex 10:17, Ju Jdg 6:39, ´[[רַק־הַפּ]] v:Jdg 6:39, [[הַוֶּה]] ´[[אַח הַפּ]] Jdg 16:28 ([[הַוֶּה]] dub., v. supr.); (2) = now at lenth Ge 2:23, Ge 29:34, Ge 29:35, Ge 30:20, Ge 46:30, Ju Jdg 15:3, Jdg 16:18, cf. also Ex 9:27 now at length (it is clear that) I have sinned.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[פָָּעַם]] …[[פַּעַם ]] Pr 7:12 now ... now, at one time ... at another.
